desc: Canadian Speed Shop, Performance Auto Parts, Toronto, Barrie, Hamilton, Ontario, No Customs, No Duties, Fast Shipping Canada-wide, AEM, Edelbrock, FiTech EFI, Flowmaster, Holley, K&N, MSD, ProForm Parts, RaceQuip, RedLine, Royal Purple, SO-CAL, Vibrant, WeatherTech, Cars, Trucks, SUVs, Trusted Since 1964, Family-owned

layout.text: We ship high-performance parts across Canada! Performance Improvements has been selling high-performance auto parts while serving the needs of our Canadian customers since 1964. As car nuts ourselves, we know the frustration of missing the part we need to get back on the road! Don't see the auto parts you’re looking for? We have thousands of speed parts not online yet, give us a call toll-free in Canada at 1-877-471-6700. In Toronto call: 416-259-9656 - in Barrie call: 705-735-1274 - in Hamilton call: 905-574-6940. Canadian pricing, no duty, easy returns.
